fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Douse someone in gasoline.
- Ignite all doused players.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Detection immune, doused players will appear to be your role to all investigative effects.
- You will douse anyone who visits you or other doused players.
- 1-use Powerful autovest.
- If you are roleblocked you will burn the roleblocker, burning their will (making it unreadable) and attacking them.
- Players will know if they are doused.
- Gasoline immunity, you cannot get doused.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure everyone dies, you dont need to be alive.
